alert.note: Alert for Boise Mountains; Upper Weiser River; West Central Mountains (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued June 08 at 3:02AM MDT until further notice by NWS Boise
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT FROM NOON MDT TODAY THROUGH THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall is possible. * WHERE...A portion of west central Idaho, including the following areas, Boise Mountains, Upper Weiser River and West Central Mountains. * WHEN...From Noon MDT today through 9 PM MDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff from rainfall may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Slow-moving thunderstorms within a very moist air mass will result in up to two inches of rainfall. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.

area.areaDesc: Boise Mountains; Upper Weiser River; West Central Mountains
